replies.msg:
小弟乃新手 如有錯漏請求賜正￼￼
43” 4K (入門級）
Sony 43x8500G: 100hz ips edge led 背光 冇local dimming

P記43gx800h : 50hz ips edge led背光 有local dimming, Dolby Vsion(DV), hdr10+
P記43gx600h : 50hz ips edge led背光 冇 local dimming

***ru7100: 50hz va 冇local dimming 有hdr10+

49“ 4K(入門）
Sony 49 x8500G: 100hz ips edge led 背光 冇local dimming

*** ru7100:同43”一樣

P記gx800h : 同43“一樣

49”（中高階）
Sony 49x9000G va 有local dimming full array DV

P記gx880 ips edge led有 local dimming DV

55” 或以上（中/高階）LCD:
Sony X8500G同43“/49”分別係多咗DV同 Dolby Atom
Sony x9500G ：升級版9000G 有晒佢所有feature 處理器再提升 ,有earc

P記gx880 ：同49”一樣
***55q70R: 100hz va 表現同x9500G相若 ,冇DV，但有HDR10+
***55q80R: 100hz va q70R升級版 ,冇DV，但有HDR10+

65”或以上 (高階）LCD:
***Q90R Q80R升級版，可以媲美OLED嘅LCD

55” 或以上 oled:
目前所有oled tv 都係用lg 100 hz oled panel，分別係用左咩技術去改良同埋比左咩配套

Sony A9F/A9G:有dv有earc, 有airplay2 ，有hdr dynamic tone mapping,color volume比其它oled稍微好,但係亮度稍低

Sony A8G : 有dv，但只有2個port 可以full bandwidth hdmi 2.0

P記GZ2000:有dv同hdr10＋,有hdr dynamic tone mapping,custom pro panel,亮度會比其它oled高
P記GZ1500: 配套同功能上同GZ2000差唔多，差別在於個音響step down
P記GZ1000：配套同功能上同GZ1500差唔多，只係影像處理器同音響再step down


LG E9/C9:有dv有earc,有airplay 2,4個port 都係hdmi 2.1,有g sync update,有dynamic tone mapping

LG B9:配套同功能上同c9大致相同，只係影像處理器step down

replies.msg:
睇睇吓，正中央出現正方形，咁似rtings burn in test week4既問題既


https://www.rtings.com/tv/learn/real-life-oled-burn-in-test
睇入面既change log

rtings當時搵左lg ，對方回覆係出廠時lookup table既問題，可以唔洗換panel就整到

不過香港應該多數唔認數

Week 4 (02/22/2018): New uniformity photos have been updated. Uniformity issues are clearly visible on the 200 nits CNN TV in red and magenta slides (but not in normal content). This is unusual, as we would expect the maximum brightness CNN TV to show uniformity issues before the 200 nits CNN TV. The 25% window we used in January to measure the color gamut is also becoming more visible on this TV (and the FIFA 18 TV) as the weeks progress, even though we haven't displayed that 25% test pattern since January. We have contacted LG to understand why this is happening and will update this article as we obtain more information.

Week 11 (04/10/2018): We contacted LG regarding the strange results in week 4. LG engineers visited our lab a few days ago and were able to confirm the 25% window on the Live CNN and FIFA 18 TVs are a result of a factory issue (see our video here). OLED TVs are produced in a hot process, and after cooling a 25% window is shown on each panel. Some TVs which haven't cooled completely can produce invalid results for the lookup table used by the 'Pixel Refresh' function, causing this 25% window to become visible. Only some 55" OLED TVs were affected during part of 2017.
As this is not an issue with the panel itself, it is possible to apply a fix to the lookup table. LG will apply this fix to anyone who presents this issue to their support, for free, even after the warranty period has long expired. They have fixed our two affected TVs (see the uniformity photos below). Note that this doesn't fix other uniformity issues as the result of static content, only the 25% window caused by a factory defect. LG has also confirmed that there is variation between panels, which is why some OLED appear more prone to developing uniformity issues (as in the case with our Live CNN (200 nits) vs Live CNN (Max).)

對唔住我認我懶冇爬文，跪求各巴打教路

而家用緊部咩function都冇既LG 42" 普通LCD TV，
用左接近六年，近日唔知做咩係畫面係咁閃，閃到頭都暈，我諗都係提我係時候手換9左佢，而海關都乖乖開關即批。

我其實冇咩要求睇得就OK，對畫質冇追求。但平時會有老人家用，所以簡單操作都緊要。
TARGET49" /55"。功能最要Stream到NAS video, mirror到smart phone video(成屋APPLE嘢）
睇到YouTube, Netflix

我要connect既device 包括 now tv 一部，Apple TV ( 如果有mirroring 可以唔駁）同埋XBOX ONE 一部（一開機海關關長會西面，所以都係係房打算數）。 所以最多三個device。

係咪三叔最抵？但如果罪大有抵玩而差唔多價錢可以罪大，始終近年用卜泡菜嘢都係好快壞。

BUDGET $5,000

replies.msg:
其實燒印（burn in)同殘影（image retention)都係因為pixel performance degrade，所以你見到好似有個印咁

不過前者關壽命事，所以係永久。
後者係因為thermal issue造成短期既degrade,。所以係唔關快速轉色事，係某pixel長著（比如長期係畫面又光既logo/overlay)之後轉去純色背景就會發現（比如打ps4 game一排，轉返出去主畫面果陣會發現到），cool down(比如黑畫面/熄機）幾秒就回復正常。平時用係唔會點出現/留意到。panasonic個custom oled panel係呢方面會表現得好d。

replies.msg:
因為你睇緊hdr content，而hdr既設計就係開到亮度max再交比顯示器跟返ST.2084 呢條 eotf

如果你真係唔想hdr content下亮度max，你應該係播緊hdr時，將亮度調低。hdr訊號下格硬set hdr模式做off只係令個畫面變得非常差（sdr同hdr條curve唔同），由佢set自動就得架啦
sony既設計係，同一組preset下，有部份參數sdr 同hdr分享，有部份係分開儲，比如亮度,對比度,etc

不過有樣野我覺得係抵屌既，就係比如你hdmi 1 set好左，但係hdmi2／3／4／youtube／tv果d又要另外set多次，冇一個功能可以一次過抄曬去所有source度

replies.msg:
